title: Summarize Stakeholder Interview Transcripts
description: An agent must process transcripts from five stakeholder interviews and summarize key themes and pain points.

tasks.description: For each of the five interview transcripts, generate a one-paragraph summary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise summary for each interview.

tasks.description: Analyze all five summaries to identify recurring themes mentioned by multiple stakeholders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies common themes like 'communication silos' and 'manual approval processes'.

tasks.description: Create a summary report listing the key themes and providing a supporting quote for each from the transcripts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report with themes and accurate supporting evidence.
